ecksdee.shapes

Class Rectangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • ecksdee.shapes.Shape
      • ecksdee.shapes.Rectangle

  • public class Rectangle
extends Shape
    models a processing drawable rectangle
    Author:
    jzhao571

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class ecksdee.shapes.Shape

        x, y

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Rectangle()
      Creates a default instance of a Rectangle object with all dimensions set to zero
      Rectangle(double x, double y, double width, double height)
      Creates a new instance of a Rectangle object with the left and right edges of the rectangle at x and x + width.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Rectangle

        public Rectangle()
        Creates a default instance of a Rectangle object with all dimensions set to zero

      • Rectangle

        public Rectangle(double x,
                 double y,
                 double width,
                 double height)
        Creates a new instance of a Rectangle object with the left and right edges of the rectangle at x and x + width. The top and bottom edges are at y and y + height.
        Parameters:
        x - x value for upper left corner of rectangle
        y - y value for upper left corner
        width - width in pixels
        height - height in pixels
        Precondition:
        length and width not negative
        Postcondition:
        rectangle is made

    • Method Detail

        Calculates and returns the perimeter of the rectangle

      • isPointInside

        public boolean isPointInside(double x,
                             double y)
        Determines whether the point x,y is contained inside this rectangle
        Specified by:
        isPointInside in class Shape
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate of point
        y - y coordinate of point
        Returns:
        boolean whether point is inside the rectangle

      • translate

        public void translate(double x,
                      double y)
        translates a circle x pixels right, and y units down
        Parameters:
        x - amount to move right (negative value for move left)
        y - amount to move down (negative for move up)

      • scale

        public void scale(double scaleFactor)
        allows user to resize circle, with the center in the same spot.
        Parameters:
        scaleFactor - multiplies the width and height by the scale factor.

      • draw

        public void draw(processing.core.PApplet drawer)
        Draws a new instance of a Rectangle object with the left and right edges of the rectangle at x and x + width. The top and bottom edges are at y and y + height.
        Overrides:
        draw in class Shape
        Parameters:
        drawer - the drawingSurface you want this to draw to of type PApplet using processing methods
